loans.name: Jamie

texts.en:
Jamie S. builds, installs, and services doors and gates.  As the owner of “Texas Overhead Doors,” Jamie works in the residential and commercial sectors of the construction industry.  A few examples of his work include building custom gates, mounting garage doors, installing fire alarms, and removing sections of wall for new doors.  He especially enjoys doing custom work that requires him to think creatively, and he has developed the reputation of being the person to call for complicated jobs.  For example, there is a large garage door installation company who contacts him for jobs they deem to be too involved to be worth their time.  As Jamie puts it, “I get a lot of weird jobs.”  

Jamie was referred to ACCION Texas-Louisiana by his local bank.  With this loan, Jamie bought a scissor lift that helps him install large doors used for commercial buildings.  This scissor lift expands Jamie’s business capabilities because its height allows him to install taller doors than he previously could.  The scissor lift Jamie bought is in good condition, and he estimates that it will last him at least ten years.

Though Jamie usually works alone, he hires sub-contractors to help him with his larger commissions.  Down the road, Jamie wants his business to begin specializing in door maintenance.  Companies would have him inspect and maintain their doors to prevent them from breaking and becoming a bigger problem later.  This line of work would be advantageous to his business because it is less labor-intensive than what he does now, while still maintaining a high profit margin.  Jamie has five children, his youngest being 17-year-old twins.

loans.use: to pay for a scissor lift.

loans.name: Patricia

texts.es:
La señora Patricia A. M. tiene  29 años de edad y vive en una casa en alquiler vivienda que esta ubicada en el Barrio Villa Avaroa de la ciudad de Tarija. Patricia es soltera y no tiene hijos, por circunstancias de la vida ella no tiene apoyo de sus padres por lo tanto se ve en la necesidad de trabajar para poder salir adelante Patricia es egresada de la carrera de Enfermeria asi que se dedica desde hace mas de 4 años a trabajar como visitadora medica vendiendo medicamentos en las farmacias siendo muy conocida por sus clientes farmaceuticos que solicitan sus servicios, Patricia quiere tener mejores ingresos para salir adelante, pero ella nos cuenta que tiene la necesidad de adquirir insumos médicos a un precio económico para de ese modo poder revender y tener otros ingresos, como ella ya tiene experiencia en el rubro el crédito será destinado para la compra de dichos insumos que son necesarios para de ese modo poder incrementar sus ingresos.    
                                                                                                                Patricia nos cuenta que quiere mejorar las condiciones de vida que tiene, por eso nos dice que el próximo crédito que solicite sera para la mejora de sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Mrs. Patricia A. M. is 29 years old and she lives in a rented house located in the community of Villa Avaroa in the city of Tarija. Patricia is single and she does not have children. For life circumstances she doesn't have her parents' support so she has a need to work in order to support herself. Patricia is enrolled to become a nurse and for the past four years she has been working as a community medic, selling medications to the pharmacies. She is very well known to her pharmaceutical clients that request her services. Patricia wants to have a better income to support herself. But she says that she needs to purchase medicines at an economical price in order to resell and have another source of income. She already has some experience and the loan will be used to purchase said products that she needs to increase her income. 

Patricia says that she wants to improve her quality of life and so she says that the next loan she acquires will be used to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase medicines and medical supplies.

loans.name: Luis Alfredo

texts.es:
Luis de 24 años, es un hombre inspirado en su trabajo que desde muy joven inicio esta actividad ya que es una tradición familiar y abrió su propia papelería.

El labora de 8H00am a 7H00pm en la venta de de su papelería con el apoyo de su esposa. con la ayuda del prestamos quiere comprar cuadernos, zapatos, y variados mercadería. lo que mas anhela es que su papelería crezca con variedad de artículos para que le genere mas ingresos.
texts.en:
Luis is 24 years old and he is a man that is inspired in his work. He started this business since he was very young, especially because it is a family tradition. He opened his own office supply store. 

He works from 8am to 7pm selling office supplies and he has his wife's support. With help of this loan he wants to purchase notebooks, shoes, and various merchandise. What he most wishes for is to have his office supply store grow and to have a variety of merchandise to generate more income.

loans.use: to purchase notebooks, shoes, and various office supplies.

loans.name: Ebenezer Group

texts.es: Adrian O.  pertenece a la alcancía comunal Ebenezer conformada hace mas de 5 años y está integrada por 8 participantes, los cuales  son todos vecinos y radican en el distrito del Agustino, un grupo con características de éxito y mucha perseverancia en el desempeño de sus negocios. Muestra de ello es el señor Adrian O. de 41 años de edad conviviente y  con dos pequeños hijos a su cuidado. El  diariamente se dedica a la reparación de instrumentos musicales que realiza en su casa ya que fue ahí donde instalo un pequeño taller, posterior a eso luego de repáralos los vende a personas que ya le avían hecho pedidos con anticipación. Con el presente préstamo lo invertirá en compra de materiales para reparación de instrumentos musicales. En el futuro le gustaría ampliar más su negocio con la compra de instrumentos musicales nuevos para su posterior venta.
texts.en: Adrian O. is a member of the communal bank named "Ebenezer". It was formed more than 5 years ago and it is made up of 8 members, all of whom are neighbors in the district of Agustino. The group is excited and perseverant with their individual businesses. The representative is Adrian O. who is 41 years old, married common-law, and he has two young children in his care. He works daily in the repair of musical instruments from his home, location where he has installed his shop. After repairing the instruments he sells them to his clients that had placed orders in advance. He will invest the current loan with the purchase of materials for the repair of musical instruments. In the future he would like to expand his business with the purchase of new musical instruments for later resale.

loans.use: to purchase materials used in the repair of musical instruments.

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es:
La señora Maria Luisa R. M. tiene  26 años de edad y vive en una casa en alquiler vivienda que esta ubicada en el barrio el Carmen de la ciudad de Tarija. Maria Luisa es madre soltera de un hijo, por circunstancias de la vida se quedo sola ahora ella tiene que trabajar para poder sacar adelante a su hijo. Maria Luisa se dedica desde hace mas de 14 años a trabajar como costurera siendo muy conocida por sus clientes que solicitan sus servicios,  Maria Luisa quiere tener mejores ingresos para salir adelante junto con su hija , pero ella nos cuenta que tiene la necesidad de comprar material de trabajo como ser telas, forros, entretelas, sierres , botones, etc. Ya que tiene un pedido de varias prendas de vestir de esa forma poder  realizar los trabajos que tiene por hacer, como ella ya tiene experiencia en el rubro el credito sera destinado para la compra de dicho material que es necesario para realizar su actividad para de ese modo poder incrementar sus ingresos.                                                                                                                                                                                                        
Maria Luisa nos cuenta que quiere mejorar las condiciones de vida que tiene, por eso nos dice que el proximo credito que solicite sera para la compra una maquina de costura.
texts.en:
Mrs. Maria Luisa R. M. is 26 years old and she lives in a rental house located in the community of Carmen in the city of Tarija. Maria Luisa is a single mother to one daughter, and for life circumstances she has been left alone. She has to work to be able to support her daughter. Maria Luisa has been a seamstress for the past 14 years and as she is very well known by her clients they request her services. Maria Luisa wants to have a better income to be able to support herself and her daughter. She says that she needs to purchase materials for her business, such as fabrics, coverings, batting, zippers, buttons, etc. She has an order for various articles of clothing and this way she will be able to make the clothing that she needs to make. As she already has experience in the field, this loan will be used to purchase materials that she needs for her business, and so to improve her earnings. 

Maria Luisa says that she wants to improve the quality of her life. And she says that the next loan she requests will be used to purchase a new sewing machine.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics, batting, zippers, buttons and other materials for her business.

loans.name: Kerly Alejandra

texts.es:
Kerly de 21 años, es una joven emprendedora que inspira salir adelante con su hijo de tres años que se dedico a la venta de morocho y de ropa a por mayor.

Ella labora todo los días en la venta de morocho con ayuda de sus padres ya que es un trabajo familiar y para tener ingresos adicionales vende ropa sola recorriendo todo el sector. Visitando a sus clientes y a la vez haciendo sus cobranzas. Vende camisas, pantalones, interiores tec. Con el préstamo quiere comprar materiales de construcción para adecuar su cas y así tener una mayor comodidad y darle lo mejor su hijo. Tambien desea comprar ropa y maquillajes para mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Kerly is 21 years old and she is a young enterprising woman who aspired to come out ahead with her three-year old son, so she decided to sell corn chowder and clothing in wholesale.

She works every day selling corn chowder with her parents' help, especially since it is a family business. As an additional source of income she sells clothing by traveling throughout the sector. She visits her clients and at the same time she takes payments. She sells shirts, pants, undergarments, etc. With the loan she wants to purchase construction materials to remodel her house improve their comfort and to give her son only the best. She also wants to purchase clothing and cosmetics to improve her income.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics, clothing, and construction materials.

loans.name: Rosa Marlene

texts.es:
Rosa de 54 años, es una mujer imprendedora que con su familia un día decidió abrir una panadería ya que uno de sus hijos sabe preparar pan.

Poco a poco incremento su capital hasta ahora que ella labora en su panadería desde las 6H15am a 11H00pm con el apoyo de su hijo. su esposo trabaja de comerciante. con la ayuda del préstamo quiere comprar arroz harina aceite viveres de hogar para vender en la panadería y en la preparación de panes. Su meta mas grande es que sigan con el negocio y arreglar su casa para que sigan juntos en armonía.
texts.en:
Rosa is 54 years old and she is an enterprising woman who, together with her family, one day decided to start a bakery, especially since one of her sons knows how to make bread.

Gradually her capital savings increased. Today she works in her bakery from 6:15am to 11pm with her son's help. Her husband works as a merchant. With the help of this loan she wants to purchase rice, flour, cooking oil, and other products that she wants to start selling in her bakery and to use in the preparation of baked goods. Her greatest goal is to keep up her business and to carry out some home improvements in order to stay together and in harmony.

loans.use: to purchase rice, cooking oil, and other baking supplies

loans.name: Yenny Lorena

texts.es:
Yenny de 31 años, es una mujer trabajadora que inicio su negocio por medio de un préstamo que hizo y un familiar tenia conocimiento de computacion que decidio abrirlo.

En su cyber tiene una empleada que trabaja para ella y lo abre desde las 14H00 pm a 22H00 pm. Con la ayuda del préstamo quiere adecuar su negocio tales como impresoras $150 teléfonos para recargas $240 y bases para Internet. ella anhela poner otro cyber fuera de la ciudad para mejorar sus ingresos y poder comprarse un carro y hacer arreglos en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Yenny is 31 years old and she is a hardworking woman who started her business with a loan that she received and with the help of a family member had computer knowledge.

She has an internet cafe and she has an employee that works for her. She operates her business from 2pm until 10pm. With the help of this loan she wants to supply her business with printers ($150), disposable cellular phones ($240), and internet stations. She strives to set up another internet cafe outside of the city to improve her income. She also wants to purchase a car and carry out some home improvements.

loans.use: to purchase printers, and disposable cellular phones.

loans.name: Perfume De Rosas Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “PERFUME DE ROSAS” iniciará su primer ciclo  en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Los Andes, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Alcira. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: Venta de fruta, venta de ropa, ropa de dama, tienda de abarrotes, venta de cosméticos, punto VIVA y fotocopiador, ferretería, venta de frazadas.

La señora Alcira,  indica que es el primer ciclo que integra una asociación comunal en Pro Mujer, y que ingreso por invitación de la promotara. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio venta de fruta que viene trabajando hace un mes atras.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella vive en concubinato y tiene tres hijos.
texts.en:
The communal bank named "The Perfume of Roses" will be on their first loan cycle with Pro Mujer (Kiva Field Partner), as part of Centro Focal de Los Andes. It is made up of eight members and it is governed by a board of directors which is led by Alcira. The members have various types of businesses. Among them are: fruit sales, clothing sales, ladies' clothing sales, grocery store, cosmetics sales, public telephone and photocopy center, hardware store, linen sales.

Alcira says that this is the first loan cycle for their communal bank with Pro Mujer and they joined following an invitation by a promoter. Currently she has had her business selling fruit for one month. 

The loan that she requests will be used to increase her capital funds. This business helps her generate an income to support her family in whatever possible. She lives with her common-law husband and their three children.

loans.use: to purchase fruits for resale.

loans.name: Asunta

texts.es:
La señora Asunta tiene 39 años está casada con el señor Alba Sergio, juntos tiene 3 hijos de 16, 13 y 8 años , los cuales están estudiando , son una familia de escasos recursos económicos pero son muy unidos y felices , doña Asunta solo tiene una preocupación cuidar y ayudar a su madre. La madre ya es de tercera edad y está a cargo de la Sra. Asunta. Asunta vive en la comunidad de la maica, la principal actividad de Asunta es la producción de la leche cruda, el producto entrega a una empresa que se dedica a la elaboración de productos lácteos, y el esposo presta sus servicios de mecánica, los dos trabajan para poder salir adelante, el destino del préstamo es para la compra de forraje, ya que se está preparando para la temporada de sequía, para lo cual recolectan mucho forraje.

Entre sus sueños y metas es aumentar la cantidad de producción de leche y que sus tres hijos estudien una carrera profesional para tener un mejor nivel de vida
texts.en:
Asunta is 39 years old and she is married to Alba  Sergio. Together they have three children of 16, 13, and 8 years old who are all studying. They are a family of scarce economic resources but are very united and happy. Asunta only has one job, and that is to take care of and help her mother. Her mother is older and Asunta is in charge of helping her. Asunta lives in the community of Maica. Asunta's primary business is production of milk. She delivers the product to a company that makes milk-based products. Her husband works as a mechanic, and the two work to be able to get ahead. The loan will be used to purchase food for the cattle, since they are preparing for the drought season and because of this they collect a lot of food.

Among her dreams and goals is to increase the quantity of milk production and that her three children study a professional career in order to have a better level of life.

loans.use: to purchase food for cattle

loans.name: Nicolas

texts.es:
Nicolas de 36 años, empezó con esta actividad  con una tienda porque en su sector no había  y como el tenia conocimientos empezó con poca mercadería y fue creciendo poco a poco.

El labora todos los días desde la 8H00 am a 20H00 pm. Con EL préstamo quiere comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite para aumentar sus ingresos. Ella anhela adecuar su casa hacer un segundo piso y surtir mas su negocio y terminar de ayudar a su hijo en sus estudios.
texts.en:
Nicolas is 36 years old and he set up a store in an area where there were no stores. He had some experience and he started with a small inventory but he gradually expanded.

He works every day from 8am to 10 pm. With the loan he wants to purchase rice, sugar, and cooking oil to increase his income. His goal is to improve his house with the addition of a second floor and to add more inventory to his business. He also wants to help his son complete his studies.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, and cooking oil.

loans.name: Rosmira Elena

texts.es:
DesD. hace 28 años, Rosmira Elena Q. D. C. creó su restaurante en la Plaza D. Mercados D. Girardota, el cual ha sido la fuente D. sustentopara ella y su familia y aunque como ella misma lo afirma no viven a sus anchas por lo menos su negocio les permite comer y cubrir sus necesidades básicas. 

Actualmente la Administración municipal reubicó todos los puntos D. venta en un espacio mucho más seguro puesto que anteriormente estaban ubicados en un sitio al aire libre y los negocios al igual que el D. Rosmira eran D. madera, plástico y cartón. 

El espacio asignado a Rosmira necesita D. algunas adecuaciones locativas para cumplir con su labor D. elaborar la comida casera que ofrece allí, por ello, necesita D. un préstamo pues no cuenta con el capital necesario para hacerlo.
texts.en:
For 28 years, Rosmira Elena Qunchía D. C. has developed her restaurant in the Mercados D. Girardota Square.  It has been a source of sustenance for her self and her family.  Even though she confirms that they do not all live at home, her business at least allows them to eat and covers their basic needs.

Currently, the municipal administration relocated all sales outlets into a more secure space.  Before, all businesses were out in open air.  Like Rosmira’s, the businesses operated out of stands maD. of wood, plastic and cardboard.

The space assigned to Rosmira calls for some upgrades, so that she can complete her work of making homemaD. food.  She needs a loan to do this, since she does not have the necessary capital.

loans.use: upgrade her business.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es: Jorge tiene 45 años de edad, natural del distrito de Quimbiri, esta casado con Modesta de 48  años de edad y juntos viven en su propia casa con sus 05 hijos donde reina la armonía. La labor que realiza Jorge es labrar la tierra, desde muy niño sus padres le enseñaron a remover la tierra, con el tiempo se convirtió en campesino, y durante años ahorró para al fin poder comprarse su propia parcela de 18 hectáreas, actualmente cultiva cacao y plátano. Tiene 20 años de experiencia en la agricultura y sabe lo arduo que es trabajar en el campo, por ello cuando es tiempo de cosecha, contrata jornaleros para que le ayuden a trasladar los productos cosechados hasta cierto lugar donde serán comercializados. Se siente muy comprometido con su trabajo; porque gracias a su esfuerzo cotidiano hoy disfruta al ver que sus plantas son de calidad,  y de cuyas ventas obtiene buenas ganancias. Sin embargo cuando es invierno, debe procurar que la plaga de insectos no perjudique sus plantaciones. Este es su 12avo  crédito con MFP, sabe que si lo paga a tiempo, podrá acceder a otro préstamo con mayor tranquilidad y sin traerle complicaciones a su banco comunal. El crédito solicitado es para la de compra de plantas de cacao, del que serán injertados para obtener fruto de mayor proporción.
texts.en: Jorge is 45 years old and he is originally from Quimbiri. He is married with Modesta who is 48 years old. They live together with their 5 children in a house that they own and where harmony reigns. Jorge's business is to work the land. Since he was a young boy his parents taught him how to work the land. With time he became a farmer and during the years he managed to save enough to purchase his own parcel of land, 18 hectares in area. He currently cultivates cocoa and bananas. He has 20 years' experience in agriculture and he knows the arduous work that is involved in the land. When the harvest season arrives he hires farmhands to help him carry his harvest to the location where it will be sold. He is very committed to his work and thanks to his daily efforts he enjoys the quality of his plants and the sales earn him a good income. During the winter he must ensure that the insect plagues do not harm his plantations. This is his 12th loan with MFP (Kiva Field Partner). He know that if he pays it on time he will be able to access a loan in the future and he will not carry any difficulties to his communal bank. The loan that he requests will be used to purchase cocoa plants that will be grafted to obtain a greater yield.

loans.use: to purchase cocoa plants.

loans.name: Porfirio Antonio

texts.es:
Porfirio está muy feliz, pues con su credikiva aumentó la fabricación de salchipapas y hamburguesas se ha entusiasmado y como necesita un fondo de efectivo para comprar materias primas e insumos para responder oportunamente, está recurriendo a su segundo financiamiento mediante la línea credikiva. 
Porfirio F. envia el siguiente mensaje a sus fondeadores de Kiva : "Muchas gracias por el apoyo financiero" esto es porque ha logrado aumentar su capital de trabajo, su liquidez sus ventas y sus utilidades y  debido a esto y con la ayuda de sus familiares, reunió dinero y compró una vivienda para el y su familia.
Si usted quiere conocer la historia de Porfirio, ingrese al siguiente enlace:
http://www.kiva.org/lend/230318
texts.en:
Porfirio is very happy because with his Kiva loan he was able to increase production of salchipapas (a traditional fast food consisting of sausages and french fries) and hamburgers. He has been encouraged and as he needs some funds to purchase ingredients and products to respond to client demand, he has requested his second Kiva loan. 

Porfirio F. conveys the following message to his Kiva lenders: "Thank you very much for the financial support. This has increased his working capital and his sales have increased, as has his competitiveness. Thank thanks to this he is able to help his family, by saving money and to purchase a house for himself and for his family.

If you want to see Porfirio's history, please click on the following link: 

http://www.kiva.org/lend/230318

loans.use: to purchase ingredients and products for his fast food business.

loans.name: Cesar Israel

texts.es:
Cesar de 18 años, es un joven emprendedor que inicio su trabajo hacer poco viendo que no había un cyber por el sector el decidió abrir uno.

El labora de 7H00 am a 9H00 pm con el apoyo de su esposa verificando por cuanto tiempo se quedan sus clientes en el Internet y también en el negocio tienen cabinas telefónicas y plays. Con el préstamo desea comprar suministro de oficinas, para surtir el lugar y tener mas ingresos. El anhela tener su local mas grande y amoblado para la comodidad de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Cesar is 18 years old. He is a young entrepreneur who started his business recently. Previously there were no internet cafes in the area and so he decided to open one.

He works from 7am to 9pm with his wife's help in verifying how much time clients stay on the internet. The business is also set up with telephone booths and videogame stations. With the loan he wants to purchase office supplies to supply the business and to have greater earnings. He strives to have a larger business and better equipped for the comfort of his clients.

loans.use: to purchase office supplies for his business.

loans.name: Mujeres Virtuosas 1 Group

texts.en:
Lucia is one of the members of the “Mujeres Virtuosas 1” (Virtuous Women 1) group, located in the town of Hato Mayor, whose economy depends on farming. Their principal economic activities are the sale of food in 'colmados' (small grocery stores) and the sale of sweet pastries. 

Lucia is the mother of 7 children, 5 of whom live with her as she is a divorced mother. She tells us that her most difficult challenge is still having sufficient money to cover the needs of her family. Her favorite activity is serving in her business.

Lucia is very moved by receiving her third loan from Esperanza Internacional, after having paid off her previous loan satisfactorily and thereby having taken a step towards the growth of her business. She has had her business for around 5 and a half years. She set up her business when she received a family inheritance. She became successful through her own initiative for creating income and being useful. She is planning to invest her new loan in the purchase rice, oil, flour, canned food, vegetables, etc. for her small grocery store.

She plans to use her profits to save because she is planning to buy a new freezer for her business. Her dream is to be able to see her children graduate from university and to be able to live in a comfortable house. Thank to these loans helping with extra income, she has been able to have an improved business and improved standard of living for her family.

loans.use: to buy rice, oil, flour, canned food, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Blanca Margarita

texts.es:
La Parrilla Paisa es el negocio que creó Blanca Margarita M. A. con la ilusión de ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y contribuir a cubrir los gastos del hogar, pues su bajo nivel de escolaridad no le permitía acceder a empleos fácilmente, por ello se dedicó a hacer lo que sabe, comidas. 

Su punto de venta ubicado en el municipio de Girardota en las afueras de Medellín es un espacio en el que además de almuerzos, se puede disfrutar de empanadas, pasteles de pollo y otros productos que normalmente la gente consume. 

Durante algunos años esta emprendedora estuvo ubicada en la Plaza de Mercado, lugar de donde fue reubicada hace algunos días por la administración municipal, por ello, necesita realizar algunas adecuaciones locativas que le permitan realizar su labor cotidiana.
texts.en:
"La Parrilla Paisa" ["The Paisa Grill"] is the business created by Blanca Margarita M. A., with the dream of offering her family a better quality of life and contributing to the household expenses. Her low level of education did not allow her easy access to jobs, so she dedicated herself to working in an area she knows: food. 

Her point of sale, located in the municipality of Girardota outside of Medellín, is a place where in addition to full lunches, one can enjoy empanadas, chicken pies, and other products which the people usually eat.  

For several years, this entrepreneur had her business on the Plaza de Mercado [market square], from which she was relocated several days ago by the city administration. For this reason, she has to make some improvements to her new location which will allow her to carry out her daily labor.

loans.use: to fix up her restaurant.

loans.name: Josefa Del Carmen

texts.es:
Josefa trabaja en servicio de transporte, pues tiene una unidad de taxi y un recorrido escolar, trabajo que logro gracias a su ahorro y su préstamo en Afodenic, en donde logro dar mejor mantenimiento a sus vehículos.
Junto a su esposo labora ya que el conduce la unidad, lo que es de gran beneficio para la economía familiar. 
Hoy con este nuevo financiamiento será para la reparación de su taxi el cual le ha dado problema para dar su servicio, ya que tiene  varias piezas que cambiar como: juego de rotulas, raquis, bolineras de patente delantera, juego de viela, juego de anillos, batería, carburador a si como la mano de obra. 
Para ella de grandes beneficios este préstamo ya que facilitan el trabajo. para un bienestar común.
texts.en:
Josefa works providing transportation because she owns a taxi and a school route.  She attained this work thanks to her savings and her Afodenic loan which made it possible for her to repair her vehicles.  She works alongside her husband who drives the vehicle; this is of great benefit for the family economy.

Today’s new loan will be used to repair the taxi, which has been causing her some problems in providing the service, because it has several parts that need to be replaced like: suspension ball joints, ball bearings, piston rods, rings, battery, carburetor and to pay labor costs.

For her, this loan will be of great benefit because it will make her work easier for their common good.

loans.use: to replace damaged parts in her taxi so that she can keep working.

loans.name: Luis

texts.es: Luis, es natural del distrito de Quimbiri, tiene 39 años de edad, es un hombre alegre y trabajador, convive con Elena de 39 años y fruto de esa relación hoy tienen 02 hijos Judith de 15 años y Antony de 06 años y juntos viven en su propia casa. Luis empezó su aventura como agricultor desde muy niño, arando en las tierras de sus padres. Su pasión por el agro le llevó a adquirir sus propias tierras, tiene ya 18 años trabajando en esta actividad y lo hace de manera independiente; cultivando café y cacao sobre sus 10 hectáreas de terreno que posee. En tiempos de cosecha contrata jornaleros para que le ayuden a extraer con mayor rapidez los frutos de cada producto,  de esa manera logra avanzar con mayor celeridad en cuanto a su trabajo. Se siente muy comprometido con su labor; porque gracias a su esfuerzo hoy disfruta al ver que sus plantas le proporcionan los mejores frutos, logrando obtener ganancias de cada kilogramo que vende. Sin embargo cuando es temporada de invierno debe procurar que los insectos no perjudiquen sus plantaciones, así con las constantes lluvias, impidiendo el rendimiento de su trabajo. Este es su 12avo crédito con MFP, esta dispuesto a pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente, ya que desea acceder a otro crédito más adelante. Con el crédito solicitado comprará  abono para fertilizar sus tierras.
texts.en: Luis is originally from Quimbiri. He is 39 years old and he is a very happy, hardworking man. He lives with his common-law wife, Elena, 39 years old. From their relationship they have 2 children, Judith, 15, and Antony, 6. They all live together in a house which they own. Luis started his adventure as an agriculturist when he was a young boy, working on his parents' land. His passion for agriculture brought him to acquire his own land and today he has worked independently for 18 years. He cultivates coffee and cocoa on the 10 hectares of land that he has. During the harvest season he hires farmhands to help him harvest the product quicker. This way he manages to complete his work at a greater pace. He is very committed to his business. And it is thanks to this business that today he enjoys watching his plants yield better products, earning better profits for each kilogram that he sells. When the winter season arrives he must take care to avoid insects from harming his plantations. The constant rain also impedes his work. This is his 12th loan with MFP (Kiva Field Partner) and he is ready to make his payments on time as he wishes to access future loans. With the loan that he requests he will purchase fertilizer for his land.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers for his land.

loans.name: Maria Patricia

texts.es:
La señora María tiene 37 años de edad, vive en la avenida Circunvalación Oeste de la ciudad, vive con sus tíos ya que ella se vino de Potosí cuando era niña y trabajo como secretaria en la zona en una oficina de sistema de agua, al mismo tiempo trabaja realizando manualidades con las señoras de la zona como un trabajo grupal.
María no pudo terminar su carrera de administración de empresas, porque ella no tenía a ninguna persona para poderla ayudar y ella trabajaba, también realizaba trabajos artesanales, María es madre soltera tiene una niña de cinco años con la que realiza todas sus actividades y trata de estar siempre con ella ya que solo vive con ella trata de estar el mayor tiempo posible porque quiere brindarle la atención que ella no tuvo cuando era niña por distintas circunstancias, pero María supo salir adelante. 
La señora María solicita el crédito para poder comprar material para realizar sus trabajos de bordados, pintados y tejidos ya que en el mes de Mayo abra una feria donde ella podría vender sus productos y también realiza trabajos a pedidos para distintas familias y para distintos centros de ayuda con el grupo de señoras que trabajan en la zona. Y de esa manera poder mejorar sus ingresos, ella sueña con tener una casita propia para ella y que su niña pueda terminar el colegio y realizar una carrera a la Señora María le gustaría que su hija estudie medicina como el sueña que ella tenía y en algún momento poderla llevar a su hija a conocer su  ciudad donde ella nació
texts.en:
Maria is 37 years old and she lives on Circunvalacion Oeste avenue in the city . She lives with her aunt and uncle as she left Potosi when she was a young girl. She worked as a secretary in the region for a water systems company but at the same time she also created crafts with the women in the community, carrying out group projects.

Maria was not able to complete her studies in business administration because she did not have anyone who could help her and she had to work and she had to make crafts. Maria is a single mother to a five-year old girl and she helps her with her businesses and she tries to always be with her. She only lives with her so she tries to be together as much time as possible because she wants to give her the attention that she did not have as a child, for other reasons. But Maria knew how to support herself.

Maria request a loan to purchase the materials that she needs to make needle-point crafts, paintings, and knits. the month of May will bring a fair where she will be able to sell all of her products. She also takes orders from families and from various centers in the area where the group of women work together. This way she will be able to improve her earnings. She dreams of having a little house of her own and to see her daughter finish school. Maria wants her daughter to study to be doctor, a dream that she had for herself. One day she wants to take her daughter to visit the city where she was born.

loans.use: to purchase materials to make crafts.

loans.name: Celia Jannet

texts.es:
Celia de 35 años, es una mujer trabajadora que empezó su actividad hace dos por iniciativa de sus hijas antes de que empezara su negocio trabajaba en empresa de producción pero como no le daba tiempo as sus hijas comenzó su negocio vendiendo ropa puerta a puerta.

Actualmente tiene un puesto de ropa y artículos varios en el malecón de playas ella lo abre en temporadas todos los días, pero después solo de jueves a domingos y de lunes a miércoles recorre con su mercadería y sus hijas la ayuda en el negocio. Con la ayuda del prestamos quiere comprar mas mercadería como ropa , interiores, pantalones de mujer. Lo que mas anhela es comprarse un carro aunque sea de asegunda mano ya que se le hace difícil transportar mercadería, tener un local mas grande.
texts.en:
Celia is 35 years old and she is a hardworking woman who started her business two years ago following her daughters' initiative. Prior to this she worked in a production company but she couldn't spend time with her daughters. So she started selling clothing from door to door. 

Today she has a clothing stand and she also sells various articles in the community of Playa. She opens her business every day during the high season, but later she only opens from Thursdays to Sundays. From Mondays to Wednesdays she travels with her merchandise and her daughters help her with the business. With the help of this loan she wants to purchase more clothing merchandise, undergarments, and ladies' slacks. Her greatest goal is to purchase a car, even if it is a used car, as it is difficult to transport her merchandise. She also wants to have a larger store.

loans.use: to purchase ladies' clothing for resale.

loans.name: Las Palmas Km 14  (Portoviejo) Group

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Las Palmas KM 14 se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.
Este es un grupo de personas que decidieron unirse  para formar este Banco Comunal y así tener acceso a los créditos para mejorar sus pequeños negocios. Se dedican a diversas actividades tales como comercio, servicios, venta de comida entre otras actividades.

Aquí conocimos a la señora Mariana del Jesús M., tiene 31 años  de edad, es madre soltera de dos  hijos de 14 y 3 años de edad, el mayor estudia en colegio. Este es su primer ciclo en el Banco Comunal y espera seguir por mucho tiempo al igual que sus compañeras.

Además de ser una gran madre también se dedica a la preparación y venta de comida rápida, tiene un pequeño puesto al borde de la carretera que une la ciudad de Portoviejo con la ciudad de Manta, en ese lugar ella vende empanadas, corviches, salchichas, cueritos asados, entre otras cosas. Trabaja todos los días en las tardes de 15h00 hasta las 19h00 en lo que es venta ya que en las mañanas ella se dedica a preparar estos deliciosos bocadillos que les encanta a las personas que transitan por la localidad. Nos cuenta que lleva 10 años que se dedica a esta actividad y que con esto ha podido sacar adelante a sus hijos.

Este crédito es para comprar plátano verde, maní, carne, salchichas, papas, cuero de chancho, entre otras cosas necesarias en su negocio.
 
Sus sueños son seguir en su negocio y darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The communal bank named "Las Palmas KM 14" meets every two weeks in the community of Montecristi. It is known for its rich pre-colonial culture and for its crafts renowned at the national and international level. This is where the famous straw sombreros originate.

This group of people decided to come together to from a communal bank and so to have access to loans to improve their small businesses. They have various business types, including, commerce, services, food sales, and other activities. 

Here we meet Mrs. Mariana del Jesus M.. She is 31 year old and she is a single mother of two children, aged 14 and 3. The eldest is in school. This is her first loan cycle with the communal bank and she hopes to keep up for a long time, as her colleagues also wish. She also wants to be a great mother. She prepares and sells fast foods. She has a small stand along the stretch of road that links the city of Portoviejo to the city of Manta. She sells turnovers, deep-fried bananas, sausages, pork rinds and other foods. She works every day in the afternoons from 3pm to 7pm. In the mornings she prepares the delicious snacks that passers-by love to eat. She says that she has 10 years' experience in the business and this is how she has been able to support her children. 

This loan will be used to purchase green bananas, peanuts, meats, sausages, potatoes, pork rinds, and other products that she needs for her business. 

Her dream is to keep up with her business and to provide her children with the best.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients such as green bananas, peanuts, meats, sausages, potatoes, and pork rinds.

loans.name: Yoel

texts.es: Yoel, de 27 años de edad, convive con su pareja Zaida y fruto de relación tienen 01 hijo llamado Jharlim de 03 años y juntos residen en su propia casa en la comunidad de Villa Quintiarina, anexo del distrito de Quimbiri. Yoel aún cuando era adolescente trabajaba en las tierras de sus padres, pero hace 05 años logró comprarse su propia parcela de 06 hectáreas en donde cultiva cacao y café.  La clave de su éxito radica en la creatividad y las ganas de trabajar, sus plantas están trabajadas de manera tecnificada porque recibe capacitación de los Ingenieros Agrónomos de manera periódica. Su  producto con mayor demanda es el grano de cacao, debido a la calidad del producto que los ofrece y fruto de ello percibe buenos réditos económicos. Normalmente trabaja solo, pero en tiempos de cosecha contrata jornaleros, para que pueda avanzar rápidamente con la extracción y selección de su producto. Su plan a futuro es seguir ampliando su producción agrícola para satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes, y con ello mejorar su condición de vida. Este es su primer crédito con MFP, sabe que este aporte le será de mucha utilidad en el progreso de su trabajo. Con el crédito solicitado contratará jornaleros para que le apoyen en las cosechas y desmonte de maleza.
texts.en: Yoel is 27 years old and he lives with his partner, Zaida. They have one son from their relationship, named Jharlim and he is 3 years old. They live together in a house which they own in the community of Villa Quintiarina, an annex to the district of Quimbiri. When Yoel was still an adolescent he worked his parents' land. But 5 years ago he managed to purchase a parcel of land measuring 6 hectares where he cultivates cocoa and coffee. The key to his success has been his creativity and his eagerness to work. His plants benefit from being cared for in a technical manner. He received training from the Agricultural Engineers periodically. The product in greatest demand is the cocoa beans, given the quality of the product that he offers and the income earned from these grains is good. He usually works alone but during the harvest he hires farm hands to help him advance in the harvest quickly. His plan for the future is to keep expanding his agricultural production to be able to satisfy his clients' demands. He will be able to improve the quality of his life. This is his first loan with MFP (Kiva Field Partner) and he knows that his support will be a great help in the development of his work. With the loan that he requests he will hire farmhands to help him with the harvest and to help him combat against plagues.

loans.use: to hire farmhands to help him combat against plagues.

loans.name: Lilian

texts.es: La señora Lilian V. V. tiene treinta años de edad, sólo ha estudiado la primaria, tiene dos hijos dependientes de 12 y 8 años, es madre soltera, vive a 8 km de la ciudad de Cochabamba en la zona de maica-quenamari ella se dedica al cuidado y producción de leche cruda y gracias a un oportunidad que se le presento, necesita capital de inversión, está comprando una vaca lechera más para su actividad, la misma que es de tradición familiar, desde pequeña ha trabajado con sus padres y tiene sus propias vacas.  Quiere mejorar sus condiciones de vida para sus pequeños hijos los cuales aun van a la escuela.
texts.en: Sra. Lilian V. V., 30, only has a primary school education. She is a single mother of two children, aged 12 and 8 years. She lives 8 km from the city of Cochabamba in Maica Quenamari. She cares for milk cows and produces raw milk. Thanks to an opportunity that has arisen, she is buying one more milk cow, and needs investment capital. Dairy farming is a family tradition. Since she was small she has worked with her parents, and now she has her own cows. She wants to improve living conditions for her small children, who are still in school.

loans.use: to purchase a cow for her dairy farm

loans.name: Las Tigresas Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “LAS TIGRESAS” iniciará su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Villa Tejada, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Mirtha. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: cabina de ENTEL, viva y venta de tarjetas, venta de edredones, venta de cosméticos, venta de frutas, venta de alfombras.

La señora Mirtha, indica que hace cinco años que trabaja con Pro Mujer. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de comida en Kiosco y pensión desde hace tres años, que aprendió de su cuñada. 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para incremento de material de trabajo. Los insumos para la elaboración de la comida las adquiere de los mercados de abarrotes en generadle la zona villa Dolores. Posteriormente lo vende en su domicilio de lunes a domingo en las horas de 11:00 a 22:00, con la ayuda de su hermana y de una empleada. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella vive en concubinato y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitación en salud y los consultorios.

En la fotografía no sale la señora Patricia por razones culturales
texts.en:
The “LAS TIGRESAS” [The Tigresses] communal bank will begin its first cycle in Pro Mujer as part of the Villa Tejada Center. The group is made up of eight members and is directed by an executive committee headed by Sra. Mirtha. The business activities of the members are varied. Among them are operating a telephone booth for ENTEL; working for Viva and selling cards; and selling comforters, cosmetics, fruit, and rugs.

Sra. Mirtha says she has worked with Pro Mujer for five years. Right now she has a business selling food from a kiosk. For three years she also has run a boarding house, which she learned from her sister-in-law.

The loan she is taking now is to increase work material. She usually gets the supplies for making food from the grocery stores in Villa Dolores. Later she sells her food at her home every day from 11:00 am to 10:00 pm, with help from her sister and one employee. The income from this work lets her support her family as much as possible. She lives with her partner and has two children. 

When she was asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she replied that she likes the health training and clinics.

Sra. Patricia does not appear in the photograph for cultural reasons.

loans.use: to increase work materials for making food to sell.

loans.name: Emanuel Group

texts.es: EL DUO EMANUEL, ESTA CONFORMADO POR, DOÑA BLANCA R. DE 43 AÑOS SEPARADA CON 6 HIJOS, DOS DE ELLOS LA AYUDAN ECONOMICAMENTE Y TRES ESTUDIAN AUN EN EDADES MENORE DE 12 AÑOS. DOÑA BLANCA TIENE UNA PEQUEÑA TIENDA Y PANADERIA QUE ATIENDE DE DOMINGO A DOMINGO, DESDE LAS 6:30 AM HASTA LAS 8:30 PM  ELLA SE SACRIFICA CON GUSTO YA QUE ES SU OBJETIVO SACAR ADELANTE A SUS NIÑOS QUE AUN ESTUDIAN SU TIENDA TIENE DE EXISTENCIA YA 6 AÑOS, Y ES EL UNICO INGRESO QUE OBTIENE, TAMBIEN HACE DONAS, SU OBJETIVO ES AMPLIAR SU TIENDA Y AUMENTAR EL INGRESO ECONOMICO EN SU FAMILIA,ELLA SOLICITA EL CREDITO PARA LA COMPRA DE INSUMOS PARA ELAVORAR PAN.  DOÑA ANA RAYES DE 42 AÑOS CASADA CON TRES HIJOS, SE DEDICA A LA VENTA DE REFACCIONES EN EL INSTITUTO, ENTRE SUS PRODUCTOS ELLA VENDE: DONAS, GASEOSAS, TOSTADAS, GOLOSINAS, Y MUCHA VARIEDAD DE PRODUCTOS DE CONSUMO DIARIO. DOÑA ANA SOLICITA EL CREDITO PARA LA COMPRA DE PRODUCTOS DE CONSUMO DIARIO  PARA SEGUIR CON SU NEGOCIO Y TENER MAS INGRESOS PARA SEGUIR AYUDANDO A SU ESPOSO CON LA ECONOMIA DE SU HOGAR.
texts.en:
One of the members of the Emanuel Group is Doña Blanca R.. She is 43 years old, separated from her spouse, and has six children. Two of her children help her financially. Three of her children are students who are under the age of 12. Doña Blanca has a small store and bakery that she manages Sunday through Sunday from 6:30am to 8:30pm. She gladly makes sacrifices so that her children who are still in school can get ahead. Her store has been in existence for six years and is the only source of income that she has. Blanca also makes donuts. Her goal is to expand her store so that she can increase her family’s financial income. She is requesting a loan to buy supplies for making bread.

Doña Ana R. is 42 years old, married, and has three children. She sells snacks at a school. Among the products she sells are donuts, sodas, tostadas, candy, and a variety of other everyday products. Doña Ana is requesting a loan to buy consumer products so that she can continue her business and generate more income to help her husband with the household finances.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for making bread.

loans.name: Amaris Del Rosario

texts.es:
Amaris E. con su anterior credikiva invirtió una parte en la  compra de Hilaza para hacer hamacas y mochilas, y con  la otra  parte hizo arreglos a su vivienda. Con su nuevo credikiva al que ahora está aplicando,  comprará hilaza, hilo fino para mochilas y bolsos y el resto lo invertirá en la compra de dulcería y refrescos para vender en tiendas de  barrios populares  en compañía de su hijo, que es su gran apoyo en esta tarea. Su mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva es el siguiente: “Que sigan prestando dinero a más personas, para que puedan trabajar  cómodamente y  mejorar sus situación económica”
Si usted quiere conocer la historia de Amarís E. ingrese al siguiente enlace: http://www.kiva.org/lend/187404
texts.en: With part of her last credikiva, Amaris E. bought thick yarn to make hammocks and backpacks, and with the rest she made repairs to her house. With the new credikiva that she is applying for, she will purchase thinner yarn for backpacks and purses, and she will use the rest to buy sweets and drinks to sell in popular neighborhood stores with her son, who is her greatest support in this work. Her message to Kiva lenders is: "May you continue lending money to more people, so they can comfortably work and improve their financial situation." If you would like to know more about Amarís E.'s story, click this link.

loans.use: to purchase thin yarn for backpacks and purses, and to use the rest to buy sweets and drinks to sell in stores

loans.name: Vicente Leonel

texts.es:
Vicente de 42 años, es un hombre inspirado que ha sacado adelante a su familia ya que decidió trabajar como albañil. 

El trabaja diariamente haciendo trabajos de albañil en construcciones. Su esposa le ayuda con los ingresos del hogar trabajando en la casa confeccionando ropa por medio de pedidos. El quiere darle una buena vida a su familia aunque un no tiene un negocio porque lo primero que quiere es construior bien su casa por eso quiere el prestamo para mejorar su vivienda y así darle  lo mejor a su familia. Comprando con el prestamo cemento, arena, pinturas.
texts.en:
Vicente, 42 years old, is an enthusiastic man that has kept his family going by deciding to work as a bricklayer. 

Every day he works as a bricklayer on construction sites. His wife helps contribute to the household income by making clothing by request. He wants to give his family a good life even though he does not yet have his own business because the first thing he wants to do is finish the construction of his own house. Vincent is requesting the loan to buy cement, sand and paints in order to improve his house and in this way give the best to his family.

loans.use: buy cement, sand, and paints.

loans.name: Manantial De Vida Group

texts.es:
el grupo Manantial de Vida esta integrado por tres mujeres, las cuales se conocen desde hace varios años y se han formado en grupo para salir adelante con sus negocios, cabe mencionar que son mujeres luchadoras y con muchos deseos de salir adelante.
dos de ellas se dedican a la misma actividad comercial que es la venta de frutas y verduras, tienen sus puestos en el mercado municipal de Nacaome en el cual venden limones, platanos, tomates, patastes, repollos, zanahorias, papas, aguacates, mangos, bananos, tamarindos, papayas, naranjas, y Glenda G. se dedica a la venta de pescado y camaron.
todas ellas dicen sentirse muy felices ya que sus negocios estan progresando y cada dia van creciendo un poco mas.
el credito lo utilizaran para la compra de mariscos, frutas y verduras. las ganancias las necesitan para cubrir los gastos del hogar.
texts.en:
The Manantial de Vida Communal Bank is comprised of three women.  They have known each other for several years, and they have formed a group in order to get ahead in their businesses.  It is worth mentioning that these women are tenacious, and they have a great desire to get ahead.

Two of them devote themselves to the same business activity, selling fruits and vegetables.  They have their stands at the Nacaome municipal market.  They sell lemons, plantains, tomatoes, chayote, cabbage, carrots, potatoes, avocadoes, mangos, bananas, tamarinds, papayas, and oranges.

Glenda G. sells fish and shrimp.

They are all very happy because their businesses are progressing.  Each day they are growing a little more.

They will use the loan to buy seafood, fruits, and vegetables.  They need the income to cover the household expenses.

loans.use: to buy  fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy bales of towels, children's clothing, jeans and used shirts.

loans.name: Joconda Monica

texts.es:
Joconda  de 37 años, es una mujer trabajadora que inicio las venta de pollo por medio de su mama y le ha servido de mucha ayuda para mantener a su familia.

Ella trabaja vendiendo pollos sola en todo el día en la venta para sus clientes. Tiene muchas aspiraciones para su negocio pero por ahora quiere darle una buena vida a su familia por eso quiere el préstamo para comprar cemento, bloque y hierro y asi construir el segundo piso de su vivienda y darle lo mejor a su hijo y que prospere más su negocio.
texts.en:
Joconda, age 37, is a hard-working woman.  She started selling chicken through her mother, and it has been a great help in supporting her family.

She works alone all day selling chickens to her customers.

She has a lot of aspirations for her business, but for now she wants to give her family a good life.  That is why she wants the loan to buy cement, block, and iron to build a second floor onto her house.  

She wants to give her son the best and to see her business prosper more.

loans.use: to buy cement, block, and iron.

loans.name: Soraya Gisella

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Trabajando Para Un Futuro. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños que son reconocidos en todo el país y por la calidez de su gente amable y trabajadora.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Soraya, tiene 40 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen seis hijos, dos mayores de edad y cuatro menores de edad que estudian en colegio y escuela, todos  aun vive con ella. Su esposo es obrero.

Ella tiene una tienda de comestibles en su casa en la cual vende todo tipo de productos, como arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes, aguas, sodas, jugos, entre otras cosas. Trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 20h00 y a veces hasta más tarde, sus hijos y su esposo le ayudan en su trabajo cuando están desocupados. Los productos los compra en Portoviejo aunque la mayoría los recibe en su local. Nos cuenta que lleva con su tienda un año y que la empezó con el primer crédito que recibió del banco.

Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su tienda, va a comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, detergentes, embutidos y otros productos de primera necesidad. Está en el Banco Comunal hace tres ciclos y le gusta porque con el crédito empezó su negocio.
 
Sus metas son seguir adelante en su negocio y que su tienda crezca cada día más.
texts.en:
In the subdivision of Rocafuerte, the members of the community bank "Trabajando Para Un Futuro" (working for a future) meet every two weeks. This place is known for the delicious sweets - known throughout the country - made by the locals and for the warm and hardworking people. 

We met Soraya here. She is 40 years old, is married and has six children, two adults and and four children who are in school. All of her children still live with her. Her husband is a laborer. 

She has a grocery store in her home where she sells all types of products such as rice, sugar, oil, detergents, waters, soft drinks and juices among other things. She works every day from 6:00am until 8:00pm and sometimes later. Her children and her husband help her with her work when they are not busy. She buys the products in Portoviejo although the majority are delivered to her. She tells us that she has had her store for a year and she started it with the first loan she received from the bank. 

She will use this loan to better stock her store. She will buy rice, sugar, oil, detergents, sausages and other essential products. She has been with the community bank for three loan cycles and she likes it because with the loan she started her business. 

Her goals are to succeed in her business and that her store will grow every day.

loans.use: buy rice, sugar, oil, detergents, sausages and other essentials.

loans.name: Enrrique Antonio

texts.es:
El señor Enrrique Antonio F. Pavon se dedica a la venta de productos de consumo diario, tiene una pulperia en su casa de habitacion ubicada en el caserio La Chucuya de San Antonio de Flores.
Don Enrrique es un hombre muy trabajador y que se preocupa por el bienestar de su familia, sobresale por ser un esposo y un padre muy ejemplar, sin vicios y dedicado a su negocio.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de mercaderia al por mayor y asi surtir su negocio.
las ganancias las necesita para cubrir con los gastos del hogar.
texts.en:
Enrrique Antonio F. Pavon sells products that are consumed daily.  He has a grocery store in his house, which is in the rural community of La Chucuya in San Antonio de Flores.

Enrrique is a very hard-working man who looks after the well-being of his family.  He stands out for being a very exemplary husband and father.  He is without vices, and he is devoted to his business.

He will use the loan to buy wholesale merchandise to stock his business.  He needs the income to cover the household expenses.

loans.use: to buy beans, rice, sugar, shortening, butter, oil, margarine, toilet paper, candles, matches, juice, soft drinks, bread, cookies, churros, condiments, soap, eggs, salt, soup, pasta, and toothpaste.

loans.name: Sonia Teresa

texts.es: La Sra. Sonia vive en la localidad de el torno, es de ocupación transportista, también se dedica a la venta de plantas frutales que ella distribuye en su movilidad, el destino del crédito es para comprar llantas y mantenimientos de su camioneta, hace servicio  el torno a la forestal una comunidad a 15 km del pueblo, es nacida en el departamento de Cochabamba, a su corta edad se vino a trabajar a la ciudad de Santa Cruz, su esposo se dedica a la agricultura, en la comunidad de espejos, tiene cuatros hijos los cuales están a su cargo, y junto a su esposo los están sacando adelante, se siente agradecida con la institución por el apoyo económico que se le ha brindado.
texts.en: Sonia lives in El Torno and provides transportation services.  She also sells fruit plants that she distributes with her vehicle.  The loan will be used to buy tires and to service her vehicle.  She provides service on the El Torno-Forestal route, a community that’s 15 kilometers from town.  She was born in Cochabamba Department but came to work in the city of Santa Cruz at a very young age.  Her husband’s a farmer in the community of Espejos.  She has four children in her care that she’s raising together with her husband.  She is grateful to the institution for the economic support it has given her.

loans.use: to buy tires and to service her vehicle.

loans.name: Rosas De Belen Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “ROSAS DE BELEN” iniciará su cuarto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Alto Lima, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Juana. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de chamarras, tejido de chompas, venta de chompa, venta de helado, venta de comida, venta de ají, comedera, venta de aceite.

La señora Juana, indica que hace dos ciclos que trabaja con Pro Mujer. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tejido de chompa de alpaca que aprendió de su suegra hace seis años. 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para la compra de lana y conos de alpaca, que adquirirá de la feria 16 de Julio(lugar comercial de la ciudad de El Alto). Posterior a la elaboración de las chompas las vende a su cuñada, quien las acomoda en tiendas. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta pagar puntual
texts.en:
The “Rosas de Belen” (Roses of Bethlehem) Communal Bank is beginning its 4th loan cycle as part of the “Centro Alto Lima” (Upper Lima Center). It is composed of 8 members, directed by a board headed by Juana. The businesses that the communal association's members carry out are varied; among them are: selling sheepskin jackets, yarn for sweaters, sweaters, ice cream, meals, garlic, cooking oil, and, also, an eatery.

Juana tells us that she has worked with Pro Mujer (Pro Woman) during 2 loan cycles. At present, she has a business knitting alpaca sweaters. She learned to do this from her mother-in-law some 6 years ago.

The loan Juana now seeks is to buy wool and cones of alpaca yarn, which she will acquire at the “16 of July” Fair (a commercial location in the city of El Alto). After knitting the sweaters she sells them to her  brother-in-law who places them in stores. The form of work permits Juana to generate income to help her family, including 2 children, as much as possible. 

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responded that she likes to pay punctually.

loans.use: to buy wool and cones of alpaca yarn for knitting sweaters to sell.

loans.name: Progreso 2011 Group

texts.es:
Hilaria, 46 años de edad, casada, 3 hijas. Presidenta de la alcancìa comunal: "Progreso 2011".
Hilaria con su esposo Oscar que es carpintero, tienen una carpinterìa desde hace 7 años. Adicionalmente a este negocio venden comida en ferias.
Hiñaria tiene 3 hijas y sòlo Rocio de 13 años depende de ellos. 
El prèstamo otorgado es para la compra de maderas para poder cumplir con sus pedidos de puertas.
En la fotografìa Hilaria esta vestida con chompa rojo y pantalòn marròn y es la primera de la derecha.
texts.en:
Hilaria, age 46, is married with 3 daughters. She is rhe president of the "Progreso 2011" communal bank.

Hilaria, along with her husband Oscar who is a carpenter, have operated a carpentry shop for 7 years. In addition to this business, they sell food at open-air markets.

Hilaria has three daughters, and only Rocio, age 13, is dependent on her.  

The loan offered to her is to buy wood in order to fulfill orders for doors. 

In the photograph, Hilaria is wearing a red sweater and brown pants, and she is the first on the right.

loans.use: to buy wood.

loans.name: Segundo Aurelio

texts.es:
Segundo de 53 años, es un hombre trabajador que inicio su trabajo hace 30 años como oficial y después como ayudante de tráiler y así fue ascendiendo su puesto.

En la actualidad trabaja transportando cargas solo 2 días a la semana y uno descansa en todo el día. Le afecta en su trabajo la delincuencia ya que la ciudad donde transporta sus cargas son peligrosas. Su esposa es ama de casa y tienen 5 hijos solo uno de ellos estudia. Con el préstamo quiere comprar materiales de construcción como hierro cemento arena. En un futuro desea buscar otra forma que conseguir ingresos independientes.
texts.en:
Segundo is 53 years old.  He is a hard-working man who started working 30 years ago as a skilled worker and then as an assistant truck driver, receiving promotions in his work.

Segundo currently works transporting freight only two days a week and one day he rests all day.  He is affected by crime in his work since the cities where he transports his cargo are dangerous.  His wife is a housewife and they have five children only one of whom is in school.  Segundo would like to use his loan to buy building supplies such as iron, cement and sand.  In the future, he would like to look for another way of making independent income.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand and iron

loans.name: Mercedes María

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Trabajando Para Un Futuro. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños que son reconocidos en todo el país y por la calidez de su gente amable y trabajadora.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Mercedes, tiene 46 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos, todos ya son mayores de edad y  estudian en universidad. El marido tiene un taller de ebanistería.
 
Es una muy buena ama de casa que para ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar se dedica a la cría de pollos, tiene  una pequeña granja de pollos en su casa hace cuatro años y le ha ido muy bien. Trabaja todos los días, compra los pollos pequeños en una incubadora y después de tres a cuatro meses entrega en varias tiendas de Rocafuerte y también a comerciantes que llegan hasta su casa, sus hijos le ayudan en esta labor.

Este crédito lo va a utilizar para comprar más pollos, medicinas y alimentos para que tengan un buen crecimiento. Lleva tres ciclos en el Banco.
 
Su sueño es que  sus hijos sean buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
In the canton of Rocafuerte, the members of the "Trabajando Para Un Futuro" ["Working for a Future"] communal bank meet every fifteen days. This area is known for the delicious sweets prepared by the inhabitants, which are recognized throughout the country, and for the warmth of its people, who are friendly and hard-working. 

In this place, we meet Mercedes, who is 46 years old and lives with her common-law husband, with whom she has three children. All of her children are grown and study at the university. Her husband has a furniture-making workshop. 

She is a very good homemaker because she helps her husband with the household expenses, by dedicating herself to raising chickens. She has a small chicken-raising operation at her home. She has done this for four years, and it has gone very well for her. She works every day. She buys the chicks from an incubator, and after three or four months, she delivers them to various stores in Rocafuerte and also sells them to commercial buyers who come to her home. Her children help her with this work. 

She will use this loan to buy more chickens, as well as medicines and feed so that they will achieve good growth. She has been with the communal bank for three loan cycles. 
 
Her dream is that her children will become successful professionals.

loans.use: to buy chickens and feed and medicines for them.

loans.name: Lucia Esther

texts.es:
Lucia de 32 años, es una mujer trabajadora  que inicio su actividad en la venta de artículos por catálogos  para solventar los gastos del hogar. Es casada y tiene 2 hijos de 14 y 11 años que todavía estudian.

En la actualidad trabaja vendiendo bajo pedido mercadería todos los días. Su dificultad del trabajo es la delincuencia ya que recorre las calles para vender las sabanas. Tiene muchas aspiraciones con sus ventas pero por ahora quiere el préstamo para adecuar su hogar y asi terminarla y seguir trabajando duro para salir adelante y darle lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Lucia is 32 years old.  She is a hard-working woman who started her business selling items through catalogs in order to cover her household expenses.  She is married and has two children aged 14 and 11 who are still in school.

Lucia currently works every day selling merchandise to customers upon request.  A difficulty she faces in her work is crime since she walks the streets selling her sheets.  She has many aspirations as regards her sales but, for now, she would like this loan so that she can do work on her home, finish it off and continue working hard so that she can get ahead in life and provide her children with the best.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand and blocks

loans.name: Maria Elsa

texts.es:
María es una pequeña comerciante, con su propio negocio de elaboración de espejo y cuadro de pinturas de oleo. Pues lleva más de ocho años trabajando en este negocio para el bienestar de económico de sus cuatro hijos.
Es atreves de Afodenic que aumento su negocio al elaborar más productos lo que han aumentado sus ventas. Así como la captación de clientes. Hoy con este nuevo préstamo podrá elaborar diez juegos de espejo estilo pata de león, así como marcos variados para la elaboración de cuadros.
texts.en:
María is a small merchant.  She has her own mirror manufacturing and oil paintings framing business.  She’s been in this line of work for over 8 years for the benefit of her four children.

Through Afodenic she enlarged her business making more items that have increased her sales and brought more customers.  With this new loan she will be able to make ten lion’s paw style mirrors as well as assorted picture frames.

loans.use: to buy raw materials to make ten mirrors.

loans.name: Claudia

texts.es: La Sra. Claudia, vive en la zona de chacacollo , es casada tiene dos hijos que se encuentran estudiando, la Sra. Claudia se dedica a la venta de comida,  la actividad que realiza es de hace 5 años realiza el preparado de chank´a de pollo y pescado a la parrilla los días viernes, sábado, domingo, por lo que es muy conocido en su zona por las riquísimas comidas que prepara ,el préstamo lo invertirá para la refacción y reparación de  su rockola ya que esta en mal estado, es una persona muy trabajadora y muy luchadora, agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Claudia lives in the Chacacollo zone is married and has two children who are students.  She sells food, an activity she’s been doing for the past five years.  She prepares chank’a de pollo (typical dish from Cochabamba) and grilled fish on Fridays, Saturdays and Sundays.  She is very well known in her area for the delicious dishes she prepares.  She will use the loan to repair her jukebox which is in bad shape.  She is a very hard working, tenacious person who is grateful to the institution for the support provided.

loans.use: to repair her jukebox.

loans.name: Miriam

texts.es:
Miriam A. tiene 30 años de edad, tiene dos hijos pequeños que están a su cuidado, ella está casada con el señor Ronal Terceros. Ellos viven en la zona de Maica Central de la ciudad de Cochabamba; gracias a su esfuerzo al menos tienen un techo donde pueden protegerse y vivir dignamente con toda su familia.
Miriam trabaja extrayendo leche de sus vaquitas, trabaja fuertemente todos los días y tiene que caminar mucho para que pueda vender su producto. 
Miriam  necesita el préstamo para que pueda comprar alimento y forraje para su ganado debido a que las malas condiciones climáticas hicieron que muera una de sus vacas, es por esto que ella quiere dar una mejor alimentación  a su ganado; ella está agradecida con la gente que por medio de Kiva le puede dar la oportunidad de contar con dinero para que pueda alimentar mejor a sus vacas y estás no mueran.
Miriam entre sus planes futuros planea sacar un nuevo préstamo para que realice mejoras en su vivienda
texts.en:
Miriam A. is 30 years old; she has two small children in her care.  She’s married to Mr. Ronal Terceros and they live in Cochabamba’s Maica Central zone.  Thanks to their efforts they at least have a roof over their heads to protect themselves and live with dignity together with their family.

Miriam works milking cows.  She works hard every day and has to walk much to be able to sell her product.  She needs the loan to buy feed and forage for her cattle because the bad weather conditions caused the death of one of her cows so she wants to feed the remaining ones better.  She is grateful to people who, through Kiva, provide the opportunity to have funds that will allow her to better nourish her cows so that they won’t die.

Among Miriam’s future plans is taking out a new loan to do some home improvements.

loans.use: to buy cattle feed.

loans.name: Angela Yahaira

texts.es:
En el cantón Rocafuerte se  reúnen cada quince días las socias del Banco Comunal Trabajando Para Un Futuro. Este lugar se lo conoce por sus deliciosos dulces que preparan los lugareños que son reconocidos en todo el país y por la calidez de su gente amable y trabajadora.

La señora Angela es socia fundadora del Banco comunal y le gusta porque los intereses son más bajos que en otras instituciones de crédito. Tiene 30 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre  y de esta relación tiene tres hijos de 10, 6 y 5 años de edad los mismos que  estudian en  escuela. Su esposo es maestro en cerrajería.

Es una muy buena ama de casa que para ayudad a su esposo realiza el crédito para el negocio del marido, el mismo que tiene un taller de cerrajería (Taller de metales) en el cual realiza diversidad de trabajos como puertas, ventanas, canales de agua entre otras cosas. Trabaja de lunes  a sábado desde las 8h00 hasta las 18h00 con la ayuda de dos personas a quienes les paga un sueldo semanal. Por su parte nuestra amiga también se dedica a la cría de gallinas y otras aves de corral. Nos cuenta que su esposo tiene este taller ya por seis años y que gracias a Dios nunca le ha faltado trabajo.

Este crédito es para comprar hierro, soldaduras, pinturas, entre otras cosas necesarias en este tipo de trabajos.
 
Su sueño es tener propia casa.
texts.en:
The “Trabajando Para un Futuro” (Working for a Future) communal bank meets every two weeks in Rocafuerte Canton.  This place is known for the delicious sweets residents prepare that are famous throughout the country and for the warmth of its kind, hard working residents.

Angela is a founding member of the communal bank and she likes it because the interest rates are lower than at other credit institutions.  She’s 30 years old and is in a common law relationship.  She has three children who are 10, 6 and 5 years of age; all are in school.  Her husband is a Master Metalworker.

She is a very good housewife.  In order to help out her husband she’s taking out this loan for his business.  He has a metal shop where he does a variety of jobs like: doors, windows, gutters, etc.  He works from Monday through Saturday from 8am until 6pm and has two helpers that he pays a weekly salary to.  At the same time, our friend raises chickens and other barnyard fowl.  She tells us that her husband has had his shop for six years and that, thanks to God, he’s never lacked work.

This loan is to buy iron, solder and paint, among other things needed for this type of work.  Her dream is to have a house of her own.

loans.use: to buy iron, solder, paint, etc.

loans.name: Xecaxjojense Group

texts.en:
Doña Santos, Doña Paula and Doña Teresa have joined together to form a solidarity group named Xecaxjojense. The group leader, Doña Santos, would like to use her portion of the loan to purchase traditional blouses for resale. She has been selling traditional blouses for 5 years and would like the opportunity to increase her sales and income. She started out in the business selling clothing as an employee for someone else, but she prefers to work independently and have the opportunity to grow her own business. 

Santos is 40 years old, single, and has 6 children. She went to school long enough to learn how to read and write which has helped her tremendously to run her own business. She would love to, one day, run a large clothing store in her community. 

The other two members of the Xecaxjojense Group are involved in animal raising and plastic goods sales. Both will use their portion of the loan to help grow their respective businesses.

loans.use: to purchase blouses for resale.

loans.name: Justo Desiderio

texts.es:
Justo de 42 años, es un hombre inspirador en su trabajo que desde muy joven aprendió en una panadería como asistente amasar panes, roscas y poco a poco empezó a trabaja en su casa con su primer horno hace ya 20 años atrás.

El labora desde muy temprano pone al horno las rosquita que la noche anterior ha preparado. Le dificulta en su trabajo es que no cuenta con maquinas moledora ya que tiene que hacerla manualmente y se esfuerza demasiado en la preparación. Esta caso ella trabajo como empleada domestica de 9am a 4pm, y los fines de semana lo ayuda, tiene 2 hijos que todavía estudian. Con el préstamo quiere comprar otro horno más grande y materiales para la producción de las rosquitas y así aumenta sus ingresos. En un futuro quiere tener su negocio con mayo ubicación y comprar maquinas moledoras para amasar para mayor facilidad en su trabajo.
texts.en:
Justo, 42, is an inspiring man in his work.  He started out very young working as a baker’s assistant learning to knead dough for bread, roscas (typical cookies) and gradually started to work from home with his first oven over 20 years ago.

He works from very early baking the rosquitas that he prepared the night before.  A difficulty he faces at work is that he doesn’t own any mixers and he has to do the mixing by hand and this is very hard work.  

He is married and his wife works as a domestic employee from 9am to 4pm.  She helps him on weekends.  He has two children who still go to school.

He wants to use the loan to buy another, larger oven and baking supplies for the rosquitas in order to increase income.  In the future he’d like to have a business with a better location and he’d like to buy mixers in order to knead the dough more easily.

loans.use: to buy a larger oven and baking supplies.

loans.name: Misael

texts.es: Misael tiene 32 años, natural del distrito de Quimbiri; es un hombre campechano y trabajador vive en su propia casa y se esfuerza al máximo por sobresalir y dar lo mejor a su futura familia. Misael desde muy niño sus padres le inculcaron a trabajar en la chacra, es por ello que es conocedor del arduo trabajo en el campo, Misael es campesino cuenta 08 hectáreas de terreno cultivados con plantas de cacao y café. Viene trabajando 10 años en sus propias tierras, En tiempos de cosecha cuenta  con el apoyo de los jornaleros quienes se encargan de cosechar y trasladar los frutos extraídos a los centro de acopio de su ciudad. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cosechar los frutos de las plantas; ya que así siente que los meses de arduo trabajo le brindan como recompensa la calidad de sus frutos. Sin embargo en temporada de invierno, debe procurar cuidar sus plantas de la plaga de insectos, así con de las lluvias constantes.
